data.name: Header.Description
data.comment: Application description and additional information.

data.name: Header.LogoFormat
Message.Goodbye
data.comment: Application farewell message.

data.name: Menu.ExitDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'exit' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.InitDescription
data.value: Initialize the application and create Eppie account.
data.comment: Description of the 'init' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.OpenDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'open' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.ResetDescription
data.value: Reset the application and erase all of its data.
data.comment: Description of the 'reset' command in the help.

data.name: Error.UnhandledException
data.comment: {0} contains error information.

data.name: Message.SeedPhraseFooter
data.value: IMPORTANT, copy and keep it in secret.

data.name: Message.SeedPhraseHeader
data.value: The application has been initialized. Your seed phrase is

data.name: Warning.InvalidPassword
data.comment: This message warns the user that the password is incorrect.

data.name: Warning.SecondInitialization
data.value: Warning: The application has already been initialized.
data.comment: This message warns the user that a second initialization is being attempted.

data.name: Error.ImpossibleInitialization
data.value: Error: The application could not be initialized.
data.comment: This message alerts the user that the application cannot be initialized.

data.name: Message.AppOpened
data.comment: This message indicates to the user that the application has opened.

data.name: Message.AppReset
data.value: The application has just been reset.
data.comment: This message indicates to the user that the application has been reset to default settings and privacy data has been removed.

data.name: Message.AskPassword
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter the vault password.

data.name: Message.ConfirmPassword
data.comment: This message prompts the user to confirm the vault password.

data.name: Warning.Uninitialized
data.value: Warning: The application hasn't been initialized yet.
data.comment: This message warns the user that the application hasn't been initialized yet.

data.name: Message.AskAccountAddress
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter the service account address.

data.name: Message.AskAccountPassword
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter the service account password.

data.name: Message.AskIMAPServer
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter the IMAP server address.

data.name: Message.AskSMTPServer
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter the SMTP server address.

data.name: Menu.AddAccountDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'add-account' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.ListAccountsDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'list-accounts' command in the help.

data.name: Message.EmptyAccountList
data.comment: This message informs the user that no service accounts were added.

data.name: Message.HeaderAccountList
data.comment: This is the header for the list of accounts.

data.name: Message.AppRestored
data.value: Your Eppie account has been restored successfully.
data.comment: This message indicates to the user that the application has been restored from a backup.

data.name: Message.AskSeedPhrase
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter a seed phrase.

data.name: Message.ConfirmReset
data.value: All local data will be lost. Do you want to continue? (y/n):
data.comment: This message prompts the user to confirm to reset the application.

data.name: MenuOption.ReceiverDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'send' command option in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.SenderDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'send' command option in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.SubjectDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'send' command option in the help.

data.name: Message.AskNewPassword
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter a new vault password.

data.name: Message.AskRestorePath
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter the path to the backup.

data.name: Menu.RestoreDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'restore' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.SendDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'send' command in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.AccountTypeDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'add-account' command option in the help.

data.name: Menu.Description
Message.AskMessageBody
data.comment: This message prompts the user to enter a text message.

data.name: Menu.ImportDescription
data.value: Import a key bundle from a file.
data.comment: Description of the 'import' command in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.KeyBundleFileDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'import' command option in the help.

data.name: Warning.UnknownFolder
data.comment: This message warns the user that the folder not found. {0} is a parameter containing the folder name. {1} is a parameter containing the address.

data.name: Menu.ShowMessageDescription
data.value: Show details of a specific message.
data.comment: Description of the 'show-message' command in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.AccountAddressDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'show-message' command option in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.AccountFolderDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'show-message' command option in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.MessageIDDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'show-message' command option in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.MessagePKDescription
data.value: The primary key of the message in the database.
data.comment: Description of the 'show-message' command option in the help.

data.name: Menu.ShowAllMessagesDescription
data.value: Show all messages from all accounts.
data.comment: Description of the 'show-all-messages' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.ShowContactMessagesDescription
data.value: Show messages from a specific contact.
data.comment: Description of the 'show-contact-messages' command in the help.

data.name: Menu.ShowFolderMessagesDescription
data.value: Show messages from a specific account folder.
data.comment: Description of the 'show-folder-messages' command in the help.

data.name: MenuOption.ContactAddressDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'show-contact-messages' command option in the help.

data.name: Information.MessageAttachmentsCountProperty
data.comment: This is a text format for displaying the number of email attachments. {0} is a parameter containing the number of attachments.

data.name: Information.MessageBccProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the "Bcc" property of the email. {0} is a parameter containing "Bcc" addresses.

data.name: Information.MessageCcProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the "Cc" property of the email. {0} is a parameter containing "Cc" addresses.

data.name: Information.MessageDateProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the date of the email. {0} is a parameter containing the date of the message.

data.name: Information.MessageDetails
data.value: Details of message #{0}: PK={1}; Date {2}; To: {3}; From {4}; Folder: {5}; Subject {6};
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying email details. {0} is a parameter containing the message id. {1} is a parameter containing the message primary key. {2} is a parameter containing the date of the message. {3} is a parameter containing the receiver's address. {4} is a parameter containing the sender's address. {5} is a parameter containing the folder name. {6} is a parameter containing the subject of the message.

data.name: Information.MessageFolder
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the folder of the email. {0} is a parameter containing the folder name.

data.name: Information.MessageFromProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the "From" property of the email. {0} is a parameter containing "From" address.

data.name: Information.MessageIDProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying a unique email ID. {0} is a parameter containing the message id.

data.name: Information.MessagePKProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the email key in the database. {0} is a parameter containing the message primary key.

data.name: Information.MessageSubjectProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the subject of the email. {0} is a parameter containing the subject of the message.

data.name: Information.MessageToProperty
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying the "To" property of the email. {0} is a parameter containing "To" address.

data.name: Information.PrintAllMessagesHeader
data.comment: Header text for list of all email messages.

data.name: Information.PrintFolderMessagesHeader
data.comment: Header format text for a list of email messages in a specific account folder. {0} is a parameter containing the account address. {1} is a parameter containing the folder name.

data.name: MenuOption.PageSizeDescription
data.value: Number of messages displayed at a time.
data.comment: Description of the 'show-all-messages' command option in the help.

data.name: Information.PrintContactMessagesHeader
data.comment: Header format text for a list of email messages from a specific contact. {0} is a parameter containing the contact address.

data.name: Message.AskMoreMessages
data.comment: This message prompts the user to show more messages.

data.name: Information.ContactDetails
data.comment: This is the text format for displaying contact information. {0} is a parameter containing the contact id. {1} is a parameter containing the contact address. {2} is a parameter containing the full name of the contact. {3} is a parameter containing the number of unread messages.

data.name: Menu.ListContactsDescription
data.comment: Description of the 'list-contacts' command in the help.

data.name: Message.AskMoreContacts
data.comment: This message prompts the user to show more contacts.

data.name: Message.EmptyContactList
data.comment: This message informs the user that no contacts were found.
